org/javautil/mp3/formatter/Mp3BaseMetadataFormatter.java10
org/javautil/mp3/formatter/Mp3MetadataAccess.java10
	public Mp3BaseMetadataFormatter() {
		super();
	}

	protected String asPair(final String name, final String value) {
		String returnValue = "";
		if ((value != null) && (value.trim().length() > 0)) {
			returnValue = name + ": '" + value + "'" + newline;
		}

		return returnValue;
	}

	// TODO document
	private String preferred(final String v1, final String v2) {
		String returnValue = null;
		if (v1 == null) {
			if (v2 != null) {
				returnValue = v2;
			}
		} else {
			if (v2 == null) {
				returnValue = v1;
			} else {
				if (v2.startsWith(v1)) {
					returnValue = v2;
				} else {
					// now what??
					returnValue = v2;
				}
			}
		}
		return returnValue;
	}

public class CommandOutput {

	// TODO make

	// public String getCommandOutput(String command) {

	// try {

	// p.getInputStream()));
	// int in;

	// input.close();

	// } catch (IOException e) {
	// throw new RuntimeException(e);
	// }
	//
	// return sb.toString();
	// }

	public String getCommandOutput(final String command) {
		Process p;
		final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
		String line;
		try {
			p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(command);

			final BufferedReader input = new BufferedReader(
					new InputStreamReader(p.getInputStream()));
			while ((line = input.readLine()) != null) {
				sb.append(line);
			}
			input.close();

		} catch (final IOException e) {
			throw new RuntimeException(e);
		}

		return sb.toString();
	}
}
